item.title: CVE-2021-26567|2024-08-03T20:26:25.524Z -- github%2Fknik0 -- faad2
item.description: Stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability in frontend/main.c in faad2 before 2.2.7.1 allow local attackers to execute arbitrary code via filename and pathname options.
